idea-plugin.name: SvgEasy
idea-plugin.description:
SVGEazy is a lightweight and powerful IntelliJ plugin that makes viewing, interacting with, and optimizing SVG files effortless.

Perfect for developers and designers working with SVG icons and assets.

Key Features:

  • Real-Time Preview: Side-by-side view with code editor and instant high-fidelity preview — see every change immediately.
  • Interactive Preview: Drag to pan and scroll to zoom in the preview pane, just like in professional design tools.
  • Built-in SVGO Optimization: Optimize SVGs with one click or automatically using SVGO to significantly reduce file size without losing quality.
  • Smooth Editing Experience: Full SVG/XML syntax highlighting and seamless editing in the native IntelliJ editor.

Whether you're cleaning up icons, optimizing web assets, or simply needing a better way to view and tweak SVGs, SVGEazy saves you time and effort.

SVGEazy — Preview instantly, interact naturally, optimize powerfully.
